author: prestonvanloon
content:
Regarding swagger vs markdown; we surveyed a few future downstream projects and the majority preferred strongly typed schema over loose definitions. Additional feedback we received was that eth1 API implementations often had fragmentation where some clients implimented some features where others didn't or it was under a different path. 

We put a lot of effort, time, and careful thinking into these API schema. We'd be happy to move under github.com/ethereum or have the new repo mirror the schema in markdown if that is preferred for a plain text overview.
